title: Spieler such Team (Silber)
body:
Hey, ich bin 18 J alt und spiele momentan in SIlber. Suche ein Team das begierig ist zu lernen und eine gute Atmosphäre bietet (no flame).  Bin Midlane Main und spiele grösstenteils late-game scale Champs wie Orianna, Viktor... 
Bei Intresse einfach Ingame melden 
Name: Ikarucz

replies.body:
Hello.
Here are the essentials:
- Age: 19
- IGN: DerAntagonîst
- Main Role: Support (but can do anything)
- Main Champs:
- Im BII, thats because i dont play Ranked like ever. Hate not getting What i want to play(was S IV last season)(I am decent, you can trial me)
- Strenghs: I am a support i am not bad and i am Nice. Never Ragequit nor Flame/Trashtalk
- Weaknesses. Ummm Have a real life. (May not have time for training. Or only in the evening)
- Hopes: A Cool Team Name.
- Also have Skype TS3 and Curse

Hope you'll accept me.
